metadata.name: Ignis
metadata.description: In a small village, artist Leif discovers a mysterious book with drawings of elemental golems. He paints them with vivid detail, and the paintings seem to come to life. But as more people see them, the golems cause chaos with their elemental powers. Leif realizes he must lock the paintings away to prevent further harm. His paintings of the elemental golems remain a mysterious and beautiful creation, capturing the essence of nature's power.
